text: Bagan Sungai Burong is a small fishing village in Bagan Datuk District, Perak, Malaysia. It has a population about 300 people, mostly of Chaozhou (潮州) descent. A Sunflower Garden was opened in Bagan Sungai Burong in 2020. == References == Category:Settlements in Kedah Category:Towns in Asia
title: Bagan Sungai Burong
